user.title: Calcio Live Configuration
user.description:
Welcome to the Calcio Live configuration wizard.

Choose one of the following options to create a sensor:

- **League**: Monitor all matches in a specific league.
- **Team**: Monitor matches for a specific team.
- **Manual Input**: If you know the team ID and want to configure it manually.

campionato.title: Select League
campionato.description:
Choose the league you want to monitor.

This will display matches for all teams in the selected league.

team.title: Select Team
team.description:
Choose the team you want to follow.

This will display only the matches for the selected team.

manual_team.title: Manual Input
manual_team.description:
Manually enter the ID of the team you want to follow.

You can also provide a custom name for easier identification.

dates.title: Configure Dates
dates.description:
Specify the monitoring period for matches.

- **Start Date**: From when to start monitoring.
- **End Date**: Until when to monitor.

Both dates must be in the format **YYYY-MM-DD**.
